General.Name: Tontek Design Technology Ltd
General.Description: Tontek Design Technology Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells consumer electronics IC design products. The company offers multimedia series products, including TV game systems; 3C appliances series products, such as AD MCUs, LCD and LED drivers, infrared IR emissions, calculators, and energy-saving appliances; and health care series comprising R2F MCUs, indoor-outdoor thermometer, sports car meter, heart rate detection, and thermometer series. It also provides touch series, including capacitive touch MCUs and capacitive touch standard products; and green energy series, such as LED driver, PIR energy saving, PIC MICU, and PIR peripheral components. Tontek Design Technology Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 166, Jian 1st Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23511
